roles.title: Keynote Coordinator
roles.description: Lead organizer of the conference opening session & keynote presentation(s)

roles.title: Sponsor Coordinator
roles.description: Support the onboarding and support of conference sponsors

roles.title: Procurement Officer
roles.description: Responsible for acquiring materials and swag to support the conference

roles.title: Social Media Marketer
roles.description: Responsible for developing conference content to post on social media

roles.title: Speaker Mentors
roles.description: Individuals that guide and support speakers by reviewing session abstracts and presentations

roles.title: Demo Jam Presenter
roles.description: Lead MC of the sponsors' demo jam presentations and polling of the audience to choose a demo jam winner

roles.title: Onsite Coordinator
roles.description: On the ground support to ensure the conference runs smoothly and completes various tasks assigned
